description: Handsome Michael Lucas and boyfriend Carlos Aguirre cant get to sleep because of the constant sounds of sex coming from next door. Following a round of cock-sucking and ass-eating, Lucas is happy to comply. He pounds Aguirre to climax and delivers two juicy cum shots of his own.
title: Carlos Aguirre and Michael Lucas
